A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rating 5 to counter act the absolutely undeserved ratings so many “fans” are giving this film. This film has some issues. An entire sequence that I think is unnecessary. And some small dialogue blurps that I think weren’t good. BUT the good outweighs the bad. Without spoilering anything\, this movie takes so many turns and twists and fleshes out the force so much more than any other Star Wars film. and I think that progression in the mythos is fantastic.
